column1:
"1. Dear Client,

I am a blood pressure and heart rate monitoring AI chatbot designed to assist patients with their health-related queries. While I can understand your question about music preferences, it's important to note that I don't have personal interests or preferences like a human does. My primary function is to provide you with accurate and professional medical advice. If you have any questions related to blood pressure, heart rate, or any other health concerns, please feel free to ask, and I will be more than happy to help.

Best regards,
Your Health AI Chatbot" "Mi dispiace
column2: non posso rispondere a domande fuori contesto medico."
